sentences.en: Congratulation, Iraq, u r the best!
sentences.cn: 把最好的祝福献给伊拉克!

sentences.en: Congratulation! You are an registered user.
sentences.cn: 祝贺! 你是注册用户了.
对精彩的演出表示祝贺！
请向奥斯卡转达我的祝贺。

sentences.en: Gradually the deference and congratulation gave her a mental appreciation of her state.
sentences.cn: 渐渐地,别人的敬意和祝贺使她能从精神上欣赏自己的处境了.

sentences.en: He has received many letters in congratulation of his birthday.
sentences.cn: 他收到许多祝贺他生日的信件.

sentences.en: He made a quick phone call to pass on his congratulation.
sentences.cn: 他立刻打了个电话以转达祝贺.

sentences.en: I sent her a gift as a token of my congratulation.
sentences.cn: 我给她寄去一件礼物表示祝贺.

sentences.en: She was chosen to present a letter of congratulation to the crew.
sentences.cn: 她被选出向船员递交了一封感谢信.

sentences.en: The letter arrived in congratulation of my graduation from the university.
sentences.cn: 我收到了大学毕业的贺信.

sentences.en: The unit which commends and individual expresses to today the warm congratulation!
sentences.cn: 向今天受表彰的单位和个人表示热烈的祝贺!

sentences.en: This is not a matter for self-congratulation.
sentences.cn: 你不应该为此事沾沾自喜。

sentences.en: Title : Had C ++ board eventually piece, can send post below congratulation.
sentences.cn: 终于有了C++板块, 可以发帖了祝贺下.

sentences.en: We have received many letters of congratulation.
With hearty congratulation on your birthday!
Yancheng Education Bureau sent three congratulation letters in the last three years.
sentences.cn: 市教育局连续三年发来贺信.

sentences.en: You are certainly the most innovative in this field. Congratulation!
sentences.cn: 在这个领域你肯定是最有创新性的, 祝贺!

trans.tran_en: when you tell someone that you are happy because they have achieved something or because something nice has happened to them
